item.title: By: Jan-Piet Mens
item.dc:creator: Jan-Piet Mens
item.description: <p>And Aspirin. Don't forget the Aspirin. I understand it thins the blood and the brain doesn't get as clogged up as w/out. Anyways, it works wonders. Believe me. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: And Aspirin. Don’t forget the Aspirin. I understand it thins the blood and the brain doesn’t get as clogged up as w/out. Anyways, it works wonders. Believe me. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />
